name: Cube beast editor
description: A voxel map editor built with OpenGL ES. Inspired by MagicaVoxel, you can create 3D model from scratch with a set of basic tools. Cross-platform, it can target web-browser with wasm support.

name: DirectX 11 Playground
description: A simple data-oriented renderer built for learning purposes. The architecture is using Entity Component System to handle graphic objects attribution and deletion.

name: Mirrors, Lasers and Robots
description: A tower-defense game built with modern OpenGL. The player has to place mirrors on the map to reflect lasers on robot waves. The architecture is made using Entity Component System.
